sentences.sContent: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.sCn: 海关官员们对于这种设备做出了一系列相互矛盾的陈述。

synos.tran: [数]矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的

remMethod.val: contra(相反) + dict(说话； 断言) + ory → 说反话的 → 对立的， 矛盾的

words.tran: 反驳；否定；与…矛盾；与…抵触

trans.tranOther: two statements, beliefs etc that are contradictory are different and therefore cannot both be true or correct
